thread.title: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Continues Award-Winning Legacy
thread.title_full: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Continues Award-Winning Legacy

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Continues Award-Winning Legacy
text:
#9 Africa Top Rated Hotels & Lodges 
Maria Jagla , General Manager of Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh, comments: “These awards are a source of great pride to our Resort, and show our dedication to creating the best possible environment for employees so that in turn we can provide the highest level of service to our guests.” 
Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh is a unique place among international beach destinations offering a desert and sea hideaway experience with year-round sunshine and world-class diving in the Red Sea. Within an oasis of lush greenery and fountains, Four Seasons is a self-contained world with eight options for dining and drinks , glamorous swimming pools , a private beach, kids’ activities , and an indoor-outdoor Spa and Wellness Centre . The Resort maintains its position as the premier luxury resort in the destination, promising guests a comfortable and relaxing experience. Share this:
